content.html: Cheap labour comes with a cost for the unprivileged. If you're all about money and live like a king, then just don't go to any country in the EU. Equality and fair pay is important. You are still OK to have ambitions, but you need to work harder for it.
content.value: Cheap labour comes with a cost for the unprivileged. If you're all about money and live like a king, then just don't go to any country in the EU. Equality and fair pay is important. You are still OK to have ambitions, but you need to work harder for it.
